resources.string: Hello, I am Using &appname;. &appname; is all in one a Anti Theft + Family safety app.
The phone will start a loud siren when someone tries to pick-pocket your mobile phone.
Someone changes the sim card in your mobile device? Get a new sim card number instantly.
Extremely helpful when you are in trouble/danger, Just click your power button 6 times and your family will get your location and emergency message.
Get instant alert & location when someone enters the wrong PIN/Pattern in your mobile phone.
Your phone is in someone\'s hand but you can\'t ask them also don\'t want to let them use it? Just Use this feature your device will be locked.
You\'re unable to find your phone even if you got it\'s location? Enable this feature phone will make loud siren and lock itself from all activities.
Get the Location of your device Without internet.
Thieves took your phone, and they are trying to switch it off right? It won\'t switch off, feel free to track it.
App not working properly, Just kill it.
Want to capture image from your front camera? This feature can be used for different purposes.
Select a format from below options to backup your contacts & sms and share directly to anyone when completed
Don\'t you get tensed if your father\'s/son\'s phone is switched off? Now you will get an alert when your phone is about to switch off so No worries!
Someone abusing/harassing/bribing you but you can\'t record their voice in front of them? Just enable secret recording it will record with any hint/Notification.
&appname; is the app which provide security in every condition. It\'s the most leading app when safety and security most matters.

Added your contact as emergency contact in Raksha Kawach (Mobile Security App).\nInstall Raksha Kawach now and stay safe:\nwww.rakshakawach.in

You are about to delete this recording and you won\'t be able to recover it.
Emergency Speed alert is a very smart feature which detects if any casualty is occurred. In case of any mishapping it lets your emergency contacts know about your current situation.
No one except you can touch your phone otherwise it will start a loud siren.

Someone who\'s not receiving calls? Worried right? Just use this feature call to pick up automatically and you can hear the.

App will save Battery Percentage, Charging Status & Location details on the server so your family can track you even if your mobile phone gets switched off.
Want to factory reset your mobile device remotely? use this feature.
(only if hardware allowed)- Just enable the Theft Mode app will try its best to not let someone do anything to your mobile phone.
Your child is using a mobile phone and you want to stop them from installing new apps? Enable this feature.
You\'re unable to find your phone even if you got it\'s location? Enable this feature phone will make loud siren and lock itself from all activities.

Suppose you lost your device & it was switched off and the person who found it wants to return it to you! but they can\'t. Or suppose your car is at No parking area how would someone connect you? Offline QR Feature will help you.
Charging in Metro/Bus/Train can be risky, right? But if someone tries to remove/steal your phone it will start a loud siren.

You\'re driving and someone is calling you, what can you do? won\'t this increase the chances of accidents? or Your office is closed but customers are calling you but you can\'t answer right? No worry Rest Mode will reply to the upcoming call that you\'re Driving/Busy.
Volume Button (3 times down and 1 up)
&appname; meant full protection to mobiles, it ensures the safety and security to mobiles in daily life. Boost up the performance of your mobile and make it safe and faster ever.

&appname; gives total freedom to your
mobile from slowest response and
inactiveness and increase the
performing speed and enhance
productivity.

&appname;, started in 2018 with a Motive to make Peoples Safe, Their mobile phones safe & Their Family Safe. Spreading &appname; to Millions and Making the insecurities go. Help Your famiy & Friends to Be safe & Secure.

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for using &appname;'s Website, located at https://kawachx.com/ By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use KawachX if you do not agree with all these terms and conditions highlighted on this page.

You are aware that this application can record, store and transmit information about phone usage and user activity. This includes SMS/MMS, calls, locations, photos, and contacts. This data will be sent to your emergency contacts, only camera images in an emergency will be stored on the server.

You are allowed to use this application only under the following conditions: You are using this application on a device that you own and use personally. You have the explicit written consent of the owner and all users of the device to be monitored. You are a legal guardian of the user of the device to be monitored.

You know and comply with the laws and regulations that cover privacy, confidentiality, and the use of such monitoring applications in your local jurisdiction. You assume full responsibility for installing or using the application.

You also acknowledge that neither KawachX nor any of the affiliates shall be liable for any damages, litigation, or other legal actions arising out of the use of KawachX.
